mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id, enterprise_name, dept_id, dept_name, kpj_id, kpj_name, fplx, fpdm, fphmq, fphmz, fpsl, ffsl, sysl, operator, status, create_time, update_time, is_del
mapper.select: select rk.id, rk.enterprise_id, rk.enterprise_name, rk.dept_id, rk.dept_name, rk.kpj_id, rk.kpj_name, rk.fplx, rk.fpdm, rk.fphmq, rk.fphmz, rk.rksl, sum(log.ffsl) as ffsl, (rk.rksl - sum(log.ffsl)) as sysl, rk.operator, rk.create_time, rk.update_time, rk.is_del from dl_rk rk left join dl_ff_log log on ( rk.enterprise_id = log.enterprise_id ) where rk.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into dl_ff (id, enterprise_id, enterprise_name, dept_id, dept_name, kpj_id, kpj_name, fplx, fpdm, fphmq, fphmz, fpsl, ffsl, sysl, operator, status, create_time, update_time, is_del) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kpjId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kpjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fphmq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fphmz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpsl,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ffsl,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysl,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})
